text: Hey Sally, I just wanted to let you know that I got hired at Mill Film as a Department Manager, so I will no longer work as a 3D artist. Until I get acquainted with this new role I will keep arts for my leisure time I guess. So I am not sure if this mentorship relationship is still relevant? Anyway, you can let me know what you think! Have a great Sunday night :slightly_smiling_face: Cheers!
